full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 200 of 228 876 LC2VMAX6 Alessi - Direct 1 THE COURT: Sustained. 2 MR. PAGLIUCA: I can break it down, your Honor. 3 THE COURT: No, no, no. I assume the objection is asked and answered. 4 5 MS. COMEY: Correct, your Honor. 6 MR. PAGLIUCA: Without a grounds, I'm unaware of what the -- 7 8 THE COURT: He said he didn't understand the grounds. 9 MR. PAGLIUCA: That's all. 10 THE COURT: Making a gesture as if we could read each other's minds. 11 12 Fair enough. I'm sustaining. Asked and answered. 13 BY MR. PAGLIUCA: 14 Q. Mr. Alessi, as you sit here today, you have no personal knowledge about whether or not Exhibit 52 was ever touched by Mr. Epstein; correct? 15 16 17 A. Correct. 18 Q. And you have no personal knowledge about whether Exhibit 52 was ever touched by Ms. Maxwell; correct? 19 20 A. Correct. 21 MR. PAGLIUCA: I think that's all, your Honor. 22 THE COURT: Okay. Counsel, I'm going to reserve, as discussed, pending additional testimony. 23 24 MS. COMEY: Thank you, your Honor. 25 May I resume direct? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012485
